channel.title: Comments on: Locle announces significant deal with Netlog

item.title: By: facebook-774344552
item.dc:creator: facebook-774344552
item.description: Great, thanks for posting this! Note: I'm not the CEO of Locle, merely one of the co-founders. CEO is ginger-headed Irishman Ronan Higgins. He'll be making the official announcement in San Francisco later today.
item.content:encoded: Great, thanks for posting this! Note: I'm not the CEO of Locle, merely one of the co-founders. CEO is ginger-headed Irishman Ronan Higgins. He'll be making the official announcement in San Francisco later today.
